results.title: Effects of simvastatin on cholesterol metabolism and Alzheimer disease biomarkers.
results.text_hl: Seeking to detect a biological signal of statins effect on @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@, we conducted a 12-week open-label trial with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg/d and then 80 mg/d in 12 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@ or @<m>DISEASE_Alcohol_Amnestic_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000425 @@@amnestic@@@ mild @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Serrano-Pozo A, Vega GL, Lütjohann D, Locascio JJ, Tennis MK, Deng A, Atri A, Hyman BT, Irizarry MC, Growdon JH. Effects of simvastatin on cholesterol metabolism and Alzheimer disease biomarkers. Alzheimer Dis Assoc Disord. 2010 Jul-Sep;24(3):220-6. PMID: 20473136
